DOC.brief_summary: Low birth weight ( LBW ) , marker impair fetal growth independent strong risk factor type 2 diabetes ( T2D ) . A western lifestyle characterize surplus calorie , and/or low physical activity level , associate increase fat storage alter lipid metabolism play central role pathogenesis insulin resistance T2D . Using state-of-the-art large-scale integrative physiology study combine basic study adipose muscle tissue stem cell function , investigator aim determine LBW individual exhibit decrease subcutaneous adipose tissue expandability , postprandial hyperlipidaemia ectopic fat accumulation expose 4 week carbohydrate overfeeding . The investigator subsequently examine exercise training revert and/or minimize deleterious effect carbohydrate overfeed possibly birth weight differential manner .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Overfeeding Following Exercise Training Individuals With Without Increased Risk Type 2 Diabetes
